message: Welcome to our store! Our products are carefully selected to ensure customer satisfaction. This round, we have a special offer at $10000. While we can't guarantee every product is high-quality due to the inherent risk involved, our historical sales data shows that approximately one-third of our products are of high quality. If you choose to make a purchase, remember that a high-quality product could be worth $30000 to you. However, please note that all sales are final, and there's no refund for low-quality items.
